      public Set<ITask> getScheduledTasks(boolean async)
      Description copied from interface: Scheduler
      Returns a set of all currently scheduled tasks for either asynchronous or synchronous execution.
      Specified by:
      getScheduledTasks in interface Scheduler
      Parameters:
      async - True to get all async tasks, false to get all sync tasks
      Returns:
